about.title: Hey there.
about.desc: My name is Marcos Frutos. I am a UX Engineer / Full Stack Designer.

data.title: User Experience.
data.desc: Following a clear path in Product Definition, Research, Analysis, Design and Validation. Taking into account Accesibility and Performance.

data.title: User Interface.

data.title: UX Engineering.
